turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Assistant, I would like a coffee today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, where would you like for me to get your coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I love their caramel latte, iced, tall please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, can I pick up anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you see if they have pizza too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I dont think they carry pizza, but if they do, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I really like cheese

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cheese got it anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you see if they will add pepperoni to that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want that large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I want that large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need sides with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ranch please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Another medium pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni on that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You dont want any other toppings? I know you love sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you're right. Add sausage to that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any sauces with that pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra marinara.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need another drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes can you get me a bottle of cold water to go with the pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I will grab that too.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would also need extra plates.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will grab the plates for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make sure they give you the receipt this time?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do!
